estate_title: Luxury Penthouse with Stunning City Views
description: Experience the epitome of luxury living in this stunning penthouse boasting breathtaking views of the city skyline. This lavish residence features top-of-the-line amenities and exquisite design.

estate_title: Exquisite Beachfront Villa with Private Access to the Ocean
description: Indulge in luxury seaside living with this magnificent beachfront villa offering direct access to pristine sandy beaches. Enjoy panoramic ocean views and unparalleled tranquility in this exclusive retreat.
facilities: Spacious living areas with ocean views

estate_title: Luxury Resort Oasis Surrounded by Lush Greenery
description: Escape to your own private paradise at this luxurious resort oasis nestled amidst verdant tropical gardens. Experience unparalleled relaxation and world-class amenities in this idyllic retreat.

estate_title: Exclusive Private Island Estate with Pristine Beaches
description: Own your slice of paradise with this exclusive private island estate offering secluded luxury and unparalleled privacy. With pristine beaches and lush landscapes, this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.

estate_title: Ultra-Modern Sky Villa with Panoramic Views
description: Elevate your lifestyle with this ultra-modern sky villa featuring sleek architecture and floor-to-ceiling windows offering breathtaking panoramic views of the cityscape. Experience luxury living at its finest.

estate_title: Exclusive Oceanfront Mansion with Private Beach
description: Discover unparalleled luxury in this exclusive oceanfront mansion featuring expansive living spaces, lush gardens, and a private beachfront. Enjoy the ultimate coastal lifestyle in this prestigious estate.

estate_title: Luxury Mountain Retreat with Spectacular Views
description: Escape to this luxury mountain retreat nestled amidst picturesque alpine scenery. With world-class amenities and breathtaking views, this resort offers the ultimate blend of relaxation and adventure.
facilities: Fine dining restaurant with mountain views

estate_title: Private Island Paradise with Luxury Villas
description: Escape to your own private island paradise featuring luxurious villas, pristine beaches, and crystal-clear waters. Create unforgettable memories in this exclusive retreat surrounded by natural beauty.

estate_title: Luxurious Coastal Estate with Infinity Pool
description: Experience coastal living at its finest in this luxurious estate featuring a stunning infinity pool overlooking the azure waters. With lavish interiors and breathtaking views, this residence offers unparalleled sophistication.
